description: The Phillips SPP3060B/17 Home Electronics Six-Outlet Surge Protector is designed to protect your small appliances, electronic devices, and gadgets from the damage that power surges can cause. Advanced technology suppresses up to 1,000 joules of surge energy to prevent harmful electrical spikes from reaching your valuable devices. Even if your home never experiences the type of event that causes instant damage, this surge protector can extend the life of your electronics by reducing the wear and tear caused by minor fluctuations in electrical current.Simplicity is. . .a Surge Protector thatprotectsyour Home Electronics andlooks greatdoing it
title: Philips SPP3060B/17 6-Outlet Home Electronics Surge Protector (White)
